Marvin Stecker
AboutResume


Hi! I am Marvin Stecker.
I am pre-doctoral researcher at the Computational Communication Science Lab at the University of Vienna, working in the OPTED project on infrastructures for political text analysis.

I am interested in digital media and culture, politics and social inequalities and funky methods. I draw on quantitative and qualitative research methods, but mostly love everything computational.

About tells you more about, surprisingly, me.
Resume contains my secret pizza recipe is the same but for lovers of bulletpoints.
